<div type="collation" xml:id="C12"> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C12"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__1"/>"Dear, dear <seg sID="C12_app2-fMS"/> Elizabeth" <seg eID="C12_app2-fMS"/> I <seg sID="C12_app4-fMS"/> exclaimed <seg eID="C12_app4-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__2"/>when I had read her <seg sID="C12_app6-fMS"/> letter"–I <seg eID="C12_app6-fMS"/> will write <seg sID="C12_app8-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__3"/>instantly <seg eID="C12_app8-fMS"/> and relieve them from the <seg sID="C12_app10-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__4"/>great pain <seg eID="C12_app10-fMS"/> they must feel." <seg sID="C12_app12-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__5"/>I wrote, and this exertion greatly <lb n="c56-0065__main__6"/>fatigued <seg eID="C12_app12-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C12_app13-fMS"/> me <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13438"/>; <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13438"/> b <mod sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13441"/> <mdel>y</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13445"/>ut <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13445"/><mod eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13441"/> <seg eID="C12_app13-fMS"/> my convalescence <seg sID="C12_app15-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13449"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0065__main__d5e13451">was</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0065.01"/><lb n="c56-0065__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0065__left_margin__d5e13460"/>had <seg eID="C12_app15-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C12_app19-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13475"/><mod eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13467"/> regularly–in <seg eID="C12_app19-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__8"/>another fortnight I was able to <lb n="c56-0065__main__9"/>leave my chamber. <seg sID="C12_app21-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__10"/> <metamark function="separate">______</metamark> <lb n="c56-0066__main__1"/> <milestone spanTo="#c56-0066.05" unit="tei:head"/> Chap. 8 <shi rend="sup"></shi> <seg eID="C12_app21-fMS"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0066.05"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__2"/>one of my first duties on my recovery was <lb n="c56-0066__main__3"/>to introduce Clerval to the <seg sID="C12_app23-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13514"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13516"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13516"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13522"/>several <seg eID="C12_app23-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13522"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13514"/>professors of <lb n="c56-0066__main__4"/>the university. <seg sID="C12_app25-fMS"/> And in doing <seg eID="C12_app25-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C12_app26-fMS"/> this <seg eID="C12_app26-fMS"/> I <seg sID="C12_app28-fMS"/> under <lb n="c56-0066__main__5"/>went <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13530">torments</del> <seg eID="C12_app28-fMS"/> a kind of rough <seg sID="C12_app30-fMS"/> usage <lb n="c56-0066__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13536">that</del> <seg eID="C12_app30-fMS"/> ill <seg sID="C12_app32-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13539">befitten</del> befitt <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13542"/> <mdel>ed</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13546"/>ing <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13546"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13542"/> <seg eID="C12_app32-fMS"/> the wounds <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13550"/>that <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13550"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__7"/>my mind had sustained. Ever since the <lb n="c56-0066__main__8"/>fatal <seg sID="C12_app34-fMS"/> night – <seg eID="C12_app34-fMS"/> the end of my <seg sID="C12_app36-fMS"/> labours &<lb n="c56-0066__main__9"/>the <seg eID="C12_app36-fMS"/> beginning of my <seg sID="C12_app38-fMS"/> misfortunes <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13560"> <unclear>(</unclear> </del> <seg eID="C12_app38-fMS"/> I had <lb n="c56-0066__main__10"/>conceived a violent antipathy even to <lb n="c56-0066__main__11"/>the name of <seg sID="C12_app40-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13569"/> <mdel>Ch</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13573">Chemistry</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13576"/>Natural <seg eID="C12_app40-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C12_app50-fMS"/> symtoms. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13622">Lo</del> <seg eID="C12_app50-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0066__main__15"/>Henry saw <seg sID="C12_app52-fMS"/> this <seg eID="C12_app52-fMS"/> and had <seg sID="C12_app54-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13628"/> <mdel>p</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13632">packed up</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13635"/>removed <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13635"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13628"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__16"/>all my <seg eID="C12_app54-fMS"/>

Waldman inflicted torture when <lb n="c56-0066__main__23"/>he <seg eID="C12_app69-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C12_app70-fMS"/> praised <seg eID="C12_app70-fMS"/> with <seg sID="C12_app72-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13700">the</del> kindness and warmth, <lb n="c56-0066__main__24"/>the astonishing progress <seg eID="C12_app72-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C12_app89-fMS"/> desire <seg eID="C12_app89-fMS"/> as I evidently <seg sID="C12_app91-fMS"/> saw <seg eID="C12_app91-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0067__main__4"/>of drawing <seg sID="C12_app93-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13788">friend</del> me out. <seg eID="C12_app93-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C12_app94-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13791">K</del> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0067.02"/>Kind <lb n="c56-0067__main__5"/>friend he tortured me without <delSpan anchor="c56-0067.02"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0067.03"/>but <lb n="c56-0067__main__6"/>it <delSpan anchor="c56-0067.03"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13807">How cruel is</del> What could I do? <lb n="c56-0067__main__7"/>He meant to <seg eID="C12_app94-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C12_app95-fMS"/> please <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13813">and</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13816">me</del> <seg eID="C12_app95-fMS"/> & he <seg sID="C12_app97-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0067__main__8"/><mod sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13821"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13823">tortured</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0067.04"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13832"/>tormented <seg eID="C12_app97-fMS"/>

I writhed <lb n="c56-0067__main__13"/>under his words, yet dared not <seg eID="C12_app107-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C12_app108-fMS"/> shew <lb n="c56-0067__main__14"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13887">my</del> <seg eID="C12_app108-fMS"/> the pain I felt. Clerval, whose <lb n="c56-0067__main__15"/>eyes and feelings were always quick <lb n="c56-0067__main__16"/>in <seg sID="C12_app110-fMS"/> di <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13894"/>s <sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13894"/>cerning <seg eID="C12_app110-fMS"/> the sensations of <seg sID="C12_app112-fMS"/> others <seg eID="C12_app112-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0067__main__17"/>declined the <seg sID="C12_app114-fMS"/> subject alledging <mod sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13900"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13904"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg eID="C12_app114-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13904"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13910"/>his <seg sID="C12_app116-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13910"/><mod eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13900"/><lb n="c56-0067__main__18"/>ignorance <seg eID="C12_app116-fMS"/> & the conversation took <lb n="c56-0067__main__19"/>a more general turn.
